attributes.action: Change the law, so that UK citizens can force an immediate General Election
attributes.additional_details: According to the pollster, the most popular reason people want an early election (46%) is because the country is in “crisis” and needs to decide a way forward.  Our PM was voted in by a members only vote, and it should not be allowed to happen.  If a PM is ousted by their party, then it should be an immediate General Election allowing ALL to vote
attributes.background: Hold a General Election immediately to give the voting public an opportunity to vote for a party than can do better than the Conservatives.  Boris Johnson was voted in and NOT Liz Truss and we think this rule needs to change to allow PM's forced out to have a GE not a party only vote

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Change the law so that UK citizens can call a General election: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/618068

If a Prime Minister resigns a general election should be called: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/620016
